sqlMap.select: select id,send_user_id as sendUser,receive_user_id as receiveUser,content,create_time as createTime from t_contact where id=#id#;
select id,send_user_id as sendUser,receive_user_id as receiveUser,content,create_time as createTime from order by create_time desc t_contact limit #start#,#limit#;

select id,send_user_id as sendUser,receive_user_id as receiveUser,content,create_time as createTime from t_contact where send_user_id=#userId# or receive_user_id=#userId# order by create_time desc limit #start#,#limit#;
